name: myfitnesspal_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on MyFitnessPal in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.food-search-results li, [class*="search-result"], [class*="FoodItem"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('a, .food-name, [class*="name"]'); const calEl = el.querySelector('.cal, [class*="calorie"], [class*="nutrition"]'); const servingEl = el.querySelector('.serving, [class*="serving"]'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href || '', calories: calEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', serving: servingEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('search') || '', result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
